lines.text: I promise you fifty wins before Christmas.
Your man gets IN THE RING forty of fifty times before Christmas he won't have enough brains left to tie his shoelaces. And then you'll have two cripples in the family.
We're brothers doesn't that mean anything to you?

[Serious]
Yes that means a lot to me. It means there's a lot of bananas
[Humorously]
hanging off the family tree.
You gotta lot of style for somebody with pigeon crap on their shoulder, Cosmo.
That ain't real pigeon crap. That's just something I had sewn on to make me stand out in a crowd. You know?
Hey, Vic. Frankie here wants to have a friendly arm-wrestling contest with you.
Do you know how many men could've been sitting on top of the world, but they let a dame tell them what to do and the only thing they ended up sitting on top of was a toilet.
[to his gang about Victor]
That guy's too stupid to be scared. He's a primitive.
Frankie! My brother who aint as handsome as you is as strong as Charles Atlas.
Your brother is a moron.
Nah. He ain't no moron.
I said he's a moron.
Okay he ain't no flaming wit guaranteed. But he can haul over four-hundred and fifty pounds of ice up five flights of stairs without blowing his breakfast. Can he do that?
You gotta start off every morning by cronin' to that low-life, bag bird?
Bella likes music in the morning.
Yeah? Then BUY THE BUM A RADIO!
Why should I walk around looking like a boiled rag when I can have a stylish set of duds for free?
I was born on the 22nd.

[after Cosmo beats Rat in a race]
Hey, nice try Rat.
I'll get you greaseball!
Everybody needs something. And I think what YOU need is a whole lotta ME, wrapped around you on a cold winter night.
Cosmo, you know in a hundred years this ain't gonna matter none.
